backend/main.mo: Main actor defining chatroom and messaging system with GIF support, access control, blob storage, user profiles, reactions, and HTTP outcalls. Includes types for Message with gifData field and MediaType variants.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldMessage records (with Text mediaType) to new Message records (with MediaType variant and gifData field), setting both new fields to null during migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: rendering GIF data in MessageBubble.tsx and ensuring GIF data structure is properly stored and transmitted via MessageInput.tsx and useQueries.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, noting that MessageBubble now renders GIFs from gifData field, MessageInput constructs GifData objects with defaults, and useQueries.ts accepts gifData parameter in useSendMessage.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally hiding header/footer on admin pages and showing 404 fallback for unknown routes.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload, removal, or Giphy search with debounced search term and trending GIFs fallback, using request ID tracking to prevent stale results.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages, handles scrolling, shows pinned videos, and manages message input with reply functionality. Includes collapsible header showing chatroom details, live status, and participant counts.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Card component for displaying chatroom previews in the lobby with thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing metadata like participant count, message count, and category badges.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog form for creating new chatrooms with support for uploading images, embedding YouTube/Twitch videos, or Twitter posts, including category selection and Twitter widget integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby navigation button that appears when in a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication is not used in this anonymous application.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Individual message display component supporting text, images, videos (YouTube/Twitch), Twitter embeds, voice messages, reactions, pinning, and reply functionality with expandable media content.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with support for text messages, image uploads, voice recording, GIF search via Giphy, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs. Includes progress tracking, error handling, and debounced search functionality.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Component that displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) with an unpin button. Renders embedded iframes for supported video platforms.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, progress slider, and time display. Handles playback synchronization to pause other audio when playing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until after a specified delay period has elapsed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that ensures fresh chatroom data on initial load by purging legacy cache entries, detecting and clearing persisted empty arrays, and forcing a refetch when the actor becomes ready. Exposes recovery state for loading indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient. Provides login, logout, identity state management, and configurable authentication options with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, creating, updating, and deleting chatrooms, plus message sending, reactions, and user profile management with localStorage-based user identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport settings, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Giphy API integration functions for searching and fetching trending GIFs with error handling and result formatting.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for html2canvas dynamic loading functionality.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and compresses images while preserving quality and orientation, with progress callbacks and fallback to original on failure.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract preview data (author, text, images) with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage-based cache manager for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs, including support for various URL formats and embed URL generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in session storage, with filtering and search capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom view page that handles message sending, view count incrementing, reply functionality, and displays loading/error states with navigation back to lobby.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, create chatroom dialog, and actor recovery handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for UI components, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a chat application at version 9 with features for URL auto-detection, Giphy integration, and media embedding. Currently has a known issue where GIFs from Giphy picker display as plain text instead of rendering as animated images.
